Room.Name: Courtyard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the main assembly floor near the review stand of Prince Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: The review stand is covered with bunting and flags, and has a great many box seats for the important people who sit here. In the center is a dais a little higher than the rest of the stand with a massive throne on it. Nearby is an open-air drummer's kiosk. The area is large enough for all of the castle's troops to assemble here, and room for visitors to stand to the sides.
